visual.name: Drill_Down_Network_PIN_By_ZoomCharts
visual.displayName: Drill Down Network PRO (PIN) by ZoomCharts

dataRoles.name: imageField
dataRoles.description: The field for node images. Only base64 encoded image content is displayed (URI that starts with data:image/<format>;base64).

dataRoles.name: nodeColorField
dataRoles.description: Field for 'dynamic' node color mode. In 'dynamic' mode a color from this field will be used. Please note that supported color format is: 'hex', 'rgb', 'rgba', 'css colors'.

dataRoles.name: linkColorField
dataRoles.description: Field for 'dynamic' link color mode. In 'dynamic' mode a color from this field will be used. Please note that supported color format is: 'hex', 'rgb', 'rgba', 'css colors'.

dataRoles.name: linkLabelNumericField
dataRoles.description: Field for setting a link label. This label should be a numeric value as the values for the same link will be summed together.

dataRoles.name: linkLabelField
dataRoles.description: Field for setting a link label. This label should be a textual value. If left blank there will be no link label displayed.

trialLicense.description: Currently, this block is meant to be hidden.

info.description: Turn off to hide the info button. The info button can only be removed if a paid license is detected.

preview.description: Hidden field, only enabling it from a theme to allow some functionallity.

hideProperties.description: Hidden field, provide values delimited with ',' from a theme to hide properties.

mode.description: Control what happens to the objects in the legend after clicking on the legend.

width.description: Control the desired width of the legend. 0 means auto. Legend width cannot be smaller than the space that it needs to render one item.

height.description: Control the desired height of the legend. 0 means auto. Legend height cannot be smaller than the space that it needs to render one item.

floating.description: This setting lets you float the legend panel on top of the chart. This might be useful in cases where you have little space available. Note, that if enabled, chart may overlap with the legend entries.

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

nodes.description: Settings used for default category nodes and values.

showImages.description: To set node image source, please see 'Fields' tab.

colorMode.description: 'Auto': visual automatically assigns different colors for each category; 'Fixed' - a color picker appears for you to choose your desired color; 'Dynamic' - a color will be picked from defined color Field in 'Fields' tab.

minRadius.description: As Node Radius is calculated based on it's value, you can limit node size by using 'Min Node Radius' together with 'Max Node Radius'. If 'Max Node Radius' is set larger than 'Min Node Radius' you will get reverse behavior.

maxRadius.description: As Node Radius is calculated based on it's value, you can limit node size by using 'Min Node Radius' together with 'Max Node Radius'. If 'Max Node Radius' is set larger than 'Min Node Radius' you will get reverse behavior.

colorMode.description: 'Auto': visual automatically assigns different colors for each category; 'Fixed' - a color picker appears for you to choose your desired color; 'Dynamic' - a color will be picked from defined color Field in 'Fields' tab.

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

fontSizeMode.description: Auto - size of the font is determined automatically by node size. Fixed - you will be able to set fixed font size in 'px' or 'pt'

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

fontSizeMode.description: Auto - size of the font is determined automatically by node size. Fixed - you will be able to set fixed font size in 'px' or 'pt'

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

opacity.description: Opacity of the gradient color, 0 - transparent, 100 - opaque. This setting controls the outermost opacity level of the node, if gradient mode is enabled. Opacity starts from 100 at the Gradient start location and decreases towards the set value in a linear way.

gradientStep.description: 0 - inside, 100 - outside. If the outer opacity of the node is provided, opacity calculation starts at this point from 100 to the specified opacity value.

baseColorSaturationAdjustment.description: 0 means 0% saturation, 100 means 100% saturation;  50 means saturation is unaffected. E.g. 51 means that additional 1% is added to the color's saturation.

baseColorLightnessAdjustment.description: 0 means 0% lightness, 100 means 100% lightness;  50 means lightness is unaffected. E.g. 51 means that additional 1% is added to the color's lightness.

category1.description: Enable or disable customization of Category #1

showImages.description: To set node image source, please see 'Fields' tab.

colorMode.description: 'Default' - inherited value from 'Default' settings; 'Auto': visual automatically assigns different colors for each category; 'Fixed' - a color picker appears for you to choose your desired color; 'Dynamic' - a color will be picked from defined color Field in 'Fields' tab.

minRadius.description: As Node Radius is calculated based on it's value, you can limit node size by using 'Min Node Radius' together with 'Max Node Radius'. If 'Max Node Radius' is set larger than 'Min Node Radius' you will get reverse behavior.

maxRadius.description: As Node Radius is calculated based on it's value, you can limit node size by using 'Min Node Radius' together with 'Max Node Radius'. If 'Max Node Radius' is set larger than 'Min Node Radius' you will get reverse behavior.

insideLabelsFontSizeMode.description: Auto - size of the font is determined automatically by node size. Fixed - you will be able to set fixed font size in 'px' or 'pt'

fontSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.

outsideLabelsFontSizeMode.description: Auto - size of the font is determined automatically by node size. Fixed - you will be able to set fixed font size in 'px' or 'pt'

textSize.description: Font Size can be in px or pt, depending on the setting selected in Advanced Settings -> Font Size Unit.
